author: jmsnell
msg: This was refactored into the form of a new "ManagedProvider" in order to keep it from affecting all Provider implementations, the AbderaServlet, etc.  BasicProvider now extends ManagedProvider.  BasicAdapter extends ManagedCollectionAdapter.
